name: LDGolf
description:
Simple golf game made for ludum dare 40 with the theme "The more you have, the worse it is".

The first level contains all the instructions you need, just click Play to begin.

I was away at the weekend so only had about 3-4 hours on Sunday and 4 hours on Monday to make this game. As a result, it's not as finished as I'd like but I did manage to make a 9 hole course.

Some bugs and potential future features:

- Some shots don't register properly

- Nicer looking menus

- Particle effects

- Sound effects and music

- Tweaking physics friction and bounce settings

- Fix certain models so that the holes are on flat ground

- Fix gaps at the ends of models (behind holes and tees)

- Global leaderboard

If you liked it, leave a comment and I'll rate your game!

Follow me on itch.io and twitter (@Marsbard_)
